text: Luiz Carlos Filgueira, known as Filgueira (born 10 January 1967) is a Brazilian football coach and a former player. He also holds Portuguese citizenship. He played 15 seasons and 399 games in the Primeira Liga for Belenenses, Chaves, Vitória de Setúbal and Marítimo. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut for Chaves on 23 October 1988 as a starter in a 1–0 victory over Académico de Viseu. ==References== ==External links== Category:1967 births Category:Sportspeople from Brasília Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brasília Futebol Clube players Category:G.D.
